alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Greene; Oconee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 05 at 12:01PM EST until January 07 at 7:51PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River near Penfield affecting Clarke, Oconee and Greene Counties. For the Oconee River Basin...including Penfield, Milledgeville, Oconee, Oconee, McIntyre, Irwinton, Oconee, Dublin, Mount Vernon... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding will continue through tomorrow. * WHERE...Oconee River near Penfield. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, Moderate flooding begins. Ward Road floods and cuts off access to L.C. Curtis and Son Sand and Gravel Company. Irrigation systems also begin to flood and need to be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 17.1 feet and steady. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.9 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 13 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
